ygData.subject: RE: Websites
ygData.msgSnippet: ... As a sysadmin, I ve just made it a habit to make symbolic links (assuming Unix) to all logical permutations of a URL.  That way you can type:
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 5 Jan 2000, John Tatsukawa wrote:

> Correction on the URL, it should be:
>
> http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqbard.htm
>
> (remove "s" from "eqbards.htm")

As a sysadmin, I've just made it a habit to make symbolic
links (assuming Unix) to all logical permutations of a
URL. That way you can type:

bard/eqbard.htm
bard/eqbard.html
bard/eqbards.htm
bard/eqbards.html
bards/eqbard.htm
bards/eqbard.html
bards/eqbards.htm
bards/eqbards.html

And you will still get the same page. One of these days,
someone will make a HTML server that will do this for you
automatically...

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
